export var questionObj={"Qtext":"
 
If \(i : j = 1 : 2 \), then find \((4 i + 3 j ):(3 i + 5 j )\)

ewline

","Steps":[{"id":"s1","n_params":0,"step_txt":" 
 It is given that i : j = 1 : 2 \\We need to find the value of \\$\frac{4i+3j}{3i+5j}$.
 "},{"id":"s2","n_params":2,"step_txt":"
 $$=\frac{\frac{4i}{j} + \input[s2v1]{}}{\frac{3i}{j} + \input[s2v2]{}}$$
 "},{"id":"s3","n_params":2,"step_txt":"
 $$=\frac{ 4 \left (\frac{\input[s3v1]{}}{2}\right) + 3}{3\left(\frac{1}{\input[s3v2]{}}\right) + 5 }$$
 "},{"id":"s4","n_params":2,"step_txt":"
 $$=\frac{\frac{4 + 6 }{\input[s4v1]{}}}{\frac{3 + 10}{2}}$$\\$$= \frac{4 + \input[s4v2]{}}{3 + 10 }$$
 "},{"id":"s5","n_params":2,"step_txt":"
 $$= \frac{\input[s5v1]{}}{\input[s5v2]{}}$$\\So, the answer is $10 : 13 $. 
 "}]};export var resp=[{"data":[],"text":" $$ Please refer back to the question $$ 
 "},{"data":[3,5],"text":" $$ Dividing numerator and denominator by j, we get the given expression.$$ 
 "},{"data":[1,2],"text":" $$ Substitute the given ratio of $i:j=1:2$ $$ 
 "},{"data":[2,6],"text":" 
 $$ Simplify the expression by arithmetic operations$$ 
 "},{"data":[10,13],"text":" 
 Upon further simplification we got the following answer."}];

sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
If \(i : j = 1 : 2 \), then find \((4 i + 3 j ):(3 i + 5 j )\)

ewline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": " 
 It is given that i : j = 1 : 2 \\We need to find the value of \\$\frac{4i+3j}{3i+5j}$.
 "}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$=\frac{\frac{4i}{j} + \input[s2v1]{}}{\frac{3i}{j} + \input[s2v2]{}}$$
 "}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$=\frac{ 4 \left (\frac{\input[s3v1]{}}{2}\right) + 3}{3\left(\frac{1}{\input[s3v2]{}}\right) + 5 }$$
 "}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$=\frac{\frac{4 + 6 }{\input[s4v1]{}}}{\frac{3 + 10}{2}}$$\\$$= \frac{4 + \input[s4v2]{}}{3 + 10 }$$
 "}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$= \frac{\input[s5v1]{}}{\input[s5v2]{}}$$\\So, the answer is $10 : 13 $. 
 "}]} 

export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " $$ Please refer back to the question $$ 
 "}, {"data": [3, 5], "text": " $$ Dividing numerator and denominator by j, we get the given expression.$$ 
 "}, {"data": [1, 2], "text": " $$ Substitute the given ratio of $i:j=1:2$ $$ 
 "}, {"data": [2, 6], "text": " 
 $$ Simplify the expression by arithmetic operations$$ 
 "}, {"data": [10, 13], "text": " 
 Upon further simplification we got the following answer."}]
